meaningMnemonic: You've seen that 泣く is to cry, so you can probably guess that 泣き is just "cry." You've also seen how 虫 is rarely a nice thing to call someone. So what's a mean thing you can call someone who cries? How about a <vocabulary>crybaby</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: The readings come from 泣く and 虫. So long as you're okay with those two words you should be able to read this one too.
